name: AppWindowSwitcher
author: Christopher Maahs <cmaahs@gmail.com>
description: Displays a chooser listing all visible windows of the currently focused application. When a window is selected, it receives focus.

modFuncs.name: showWindowChooser
modFuncs.doc: Show a chooser with all visible windows of the currently focused app. Selecting one focuses that window.

modFuncs.name: bindHotkey
modFuncs.doc: Binds the Spoonâ€™s configured hotkey to trigger the window chooser. Configure `hotkey` before calling this.

modVars.name: hotkey
modVars.doc: Table defining the hotkey to bind for the chooser. Format: `{ mods = {"command", "ctrl", "alt"}, key = "w" }`
